Text:
This has some pretty cool footage. I enjoyed the carpark interview as a cool insight to what the guys were like off the stage back in those days. The first interview has Jason in what must be very late '86 but the rest is Cliff-era for all you Burtonaholics out there. While short the first Phantom Lord clip is amazingly clear.

Think of this as a bonus disc to go with Cliff 'Em All and you'll love it!
